Item 1
About Us
Welcome to Anna Maria Beach Resort, a fully remodeled paradise on the white sands of Anna Maria Island. This beachfront resort offers stunning views from every room and provides access to numerous amenities to enhance your vacation experience. During your stay, you can explore Anna Maria Island's nearby attractions, including signature dining spots and charming island boutiques. For those looking to venture beyond the island, Downtown Bradenton and Sarasota are just a short drive away.
View another section
Key Features
FAQ
Getting Here
Key Features
FAQ
Getting Here
Key Features
Anna Maria Beach Resort, originally known as the Blue Water Beach Club, underwent a complete transformation in 2018. The property, which once embodied the charm of Old Florida, was reimagined to match its unrivaled beachfront location with luxurious accommodations. The resort was entirely renovated from the inside out, with each room redesigned to offer a premium vacation experience, featuring in-room amenities that provide the comforts of home. Additionally, new outdoor amenities were introduced, enhancing your getaway experience at Anna Maria Beach Resort.
31 luxury guest rooms and suites
Kitchens and kitchenettes for extended vacations
Exceptional beachfront location with beach setup
Oversized zero-entry pool and heated spa
Private poolside cabanas available for daily rental
Bike rental for guests
On-site trolley stop for easy island exploration
FAQ
What is the cancellation policy?
7 Days Cancellation Policy. The card used to secure the reservation will be charged one night room, tax and fees upon booking. Cancel for free up to 7 days before check-in by 4pm hotel local time. After that, one night's charge, tax, and fees will apply for late cancellation. Prepaid and advance purchase reservations are non-refundable and subject to offer terms and conditions at the time of booking. The balance of the reservation fee will be charged to the card on file upon arrival. No show, late arrival, or early check-out are subject to all room night charges, taxes, and fees applicable to the original reservation.
here
.
Do I need travel insurance?
We recommend travel protection to cover any unexpected circumstances that may threaten your Anna Maria Island getaway.
What time is check-in and checkout?
Check-in is at 4:00 pm. Checkout is at 10:00 am.
Are early check-ins and late checkouts available?
We will make every effort to accommodate early arrivals and late departures but cannot guarantee them. Please inquire with our front desk for more information upon arrival or during your stay.
Is the resort beachfront?
Yes!
What beach is the resort located on?
The resort is in Holmes Beach on Anna Maria Island.
What rooms are the closest to the beach?
The Oceanfront 1 Bedroom King Suite and Oceanfront Luxury 1 Bedroom Suite are the closest to the beach. All rooms offer either beach or pool views.
Can I bring more than one car?
Due to limited parking, we can only accommodate 1 car per reservation. We cannot guarantee additional parking passes during your stay.
Is the pool heated?
Yes, the pool is heated. There is also a hot tub.
What are the pool hours?
The pool is open daily from 8:00 am – 10:00 pm.
Does the resort have a bar or restaurant?
No, our resort does not have an onsite bar or restaurant. There are multiple options nearby.
Is there coffee and tea in the rooms?
Yes, every room has a Keurig coffee maker, and we provide fresh coffee pods daily. We do not offer tea in the rooms.
Are beach chairs and umbrellas provided?
Yes, beach loungers and umbrellas are provided and available on a first come, first served basis.
Is the resort family-friendly?
Yes! Anna Maria Beach Resort was designed for all types of vacations.
Are there bikes at the resort?
We do offer complimentary bikes with locks and helmets – available on a first-come, first-serve basis.
Is there an elevator?
No, there is no elevator. The resort is two-story, if you need ground floor accommodation, please contact our front desk.
Are there laundry facilities at the resort?​​​​​​
No. There is a laundromat nearby at the Island Shopping Center, less than 5 minutes from the resort.
Can I park a boat trailer at the resort?
No, we cannot accommodate any trailer parking at the resort.
Is the resort pet-friendly?
No, but some local businesses on Anna Maria Island offer pet boarding.
Where is the closest trolley location?
The closest trolley location to take you south is on the left side of the resort entrance.
Do I need a car when visiting Anna Maria Island?
You don’t necessarily need a car on the island. There is a free trolley system that serves the whole island and many shopping and dining options within walking distance of the resort. You may also consider renting bikes during your stay.
What are the closest restaurants to the resort?
Beach Bistro
is the closest restaurant to the resort.
SALT Bar
,
Duffey’s Tavern
,
The Ugly Grouper
, and
The Feast
are also nearby.
Airport Information
Are you booking your vacation to The Anna Maria Beach Resort and plan on flying? It is important to know where the nearby airports are located. There are four airports in the area that you can arrive and depart from and they range in distance from 30 minutes to 2 hours away from Anna Maria Island. We have partnered with a local concierge service to assist with renting a car or scheduling a shuttle ride from the airport to the hotel. If you have any other questions please feel free to contact us at 941-254-2888 and we would be glad to help. We hope you enjoy your stay at The Anna Maria Beach Resort.
Shuttle & Rental Car Services
Our preferred partner, Concierge AMI, offers airport shuttle service to the Resort. Contact Concierge AMI at 941-526-0264 or
click here
to book online. If you prefer the option of a rental car, we have partnered with two of the major car rental providers,
Enterprise Car Rental and National Car Rental
, to offer a discount to our guests.
Call 855-266-9565 and enter the code “XZ35AMV” to receive a discount off your Enterprise Car Rental. If you would like to use National Car Rental, call 888-445-5664 and enter the code “XZ35AMV” to receive a discounted rate.
Sarasota-Bradenton International Airport (SRQ)
The
Sarasota-Bradenton International Airport
is the closest airport to Anna Maria Island. It is only about a 30-minute drive. The airport has free parking up to 30 minutes in the short-term parking lot, which is in front of the terminal making it easy to be picked up from there.
Tampa International (TPA)
Tampa International Airport
is a little farther away than Sarasota-Bradenton International. This airport is about an hour drive from Anna Maria Island. Since this is an international airport, you need to arrive at least two hours before your flight if you are flying internationally.
St. Pete – Clearwater International Airport (PIE)
When flying into PIE, you are only a 45 minute to an hour drive from Anna Maria Island. You will fly right into the center of Tampa Bay, about 9 miles north of downtown St. Petersburg.
St. Pete – Clearwater International Airport
Orlando International Airport (MCO)
If you choose to fly in or out of
Orlando International Airport
it is the furthest from Anna Maria Island. It is about a 2-hour drive, but it is a major international gateway for the mid-Florida region.

For those looking to venture beyond the island, Downtown Bradenton and Sarasota are just a short drive away.
